text: Then he tried it out for sound. Um-chink... um-chink... it went. Slightly flat and Philips company. Within two days Mr. Lisbon had a record contract. And they hauled his thumb-tacked joanna the thirteen miles to London for his first session. Then he tried it out for sounol. Um-chink... um-chink... it went.
